channel.title: Need help with master command. Please help
channel.description: :confused: Ok i need to know how to make a master command. Whenever i try to make one and I compile i get errors. Can someone post a successful master code and how to use it. Thanks!

item.title: Need help with master command. Please help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

[quote=“drakeman, post:6, topic:298571”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) or && playerRights= 2 { addSkillXP(13200000, 0); addSkillXP(13200000, 1); addSkillXP(13200000, 2); addSkillXP(13200000, 3); addSkillXP(13200000, 4); addSkillXP(13200000, 5); addSkillXP(13200000, 6); addSkillXP(13200000, 7); addSkillXP(13200000, 8); addSkillXP(13200000, 9); addSkillXP(13200000, 10); addSkillXP(13200000, 11); addSkillXP(13200000, 12); addSkillXP(13200000, 13); addSkillXP(13200000, 14); addSkillXP(13200000, 15); addSkillXP(13200000, 16); addSkillXP(13200000, 17); addSkillXP(13200000, 18); addSkillXP(13200000, 19); addSkillXP(13200000, 20); addSkillXP(13200000, 21); addSkillXP(13200000, 22); addSkillXP(13200000, 23); sendMessage(""+ playerName +" You just got max skills..!"); }[/quote]

We already answered him and please next time use code tags.

item.title: Need help with master command. Please help
item.dc:creator: @drakeman drakeman
item.description:
@drakeman wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAMEHERE”)) or && playerRights= 2
{
addSkillXP(13200000, 0);
addSkillXP(13200000, 1);
addSkillXP(13200000, 2);
addSkillXP(13200000, 3);
addSkillXP(13200000, 4);
addSkillXP(13200000, 5);
addSkillXP(13200000, 6);
addSkillXP(13200000, 7);
addSkillXP(13200000, 8);
addSkillXP(13200000, 9);
addSkillXP(13200000, 10);
addSkillXP(13200000, 11);
addSkillXP(13200000, 12);
addSkillXP(13200000, 13);
addSkillXP(13200000, 14);
addSkillXP(13200000, 15);
addSkillXP(13200000, 16);
addSkillXP(13200000, 17);
addSkillXP(13200000, 18);
addSkillXP(13200000, 19);
addSkillXP(13200000, 20);
addSkillXP(13200000, 21);
addSkillXP(13200000, 22);
addSkillXP(13200000, 23);
sendMessage(""+ playerName +" You just got max skills…!");
}

item.title: Need help with master command. Please help
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

Put it in your commands part of client.java, Search for one of your existing command by doing CTRL+F then paste the code Fox0wnage supplied somewhere near, Hope i helped

Make sure you put it after the parenthesis (brace)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with master command. Please help

item.title: Need help with master command. Please help
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

Put it in client.java underneath a command. for example…
Say this was the command you put it under

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }
It would look like this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); } if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

Hope it helped.

Read full topic
